actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain a larger and adequate spillway, and to improve the upstream slope protection on Belle Fourche Dam, Belle Fourche project, Belle Fourche, S. Dak., and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain a larger and adequate spillway, and to improve the upstream slope protection on Belle Fourche Dam, Belle Fourche project, Belle Fourche, South Dakota. States that the construction authorized by this Act shall be for flood control and safety of dams purposes and not for the purpose of providing additional conservation storage capacity, or developing benefits over and above those provided by the original dam and reservoir. Authorizes an appropriation for the construction of a larger spillway for Belle Fourche Dam and to improve the upstream slope protection on the dam in the sum of $3,250,000.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain a larger and adequate spillway, and to improve the upstream slope protection on Belle Fourche Dam, Belle Fourche project, Belle Fourche, S. Dak., and for other purposes.
